long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As you navigate the internet, you leave traces of data behind. From just visiting to creating an account or placing an order, your digital footprint gets bigger and bigger, making it easy for internet companies or criminals to uncover and exploit your real identity.

In its role as personal data management software, the goal of Privci is to protect your personal data and digital identity by unravelling the privacy claims of the websites you visit.

1 - One step closer to reality
Privci will demystify the privacy policy of the website you visit for answers to questions such as:
  ● How does the site protect personal data?
  ● Is the precise location of users inferred?
  ● How long is personal data retained? 
  ● What have I agreed to as a user of the website?
  ● What are my rights as a data subject?
  ● Has the site added any well-known cookies to my browser?

2 - Go online with confidence
With Privci, you will be equipped with tools that enable you to:
  ● Keep track of websites that are collecting personal data about you
  ● Ask the privacy policy your own questions
  ● Request data access, erasure, rectification of any data held about you, and more

3 - Decide who keeps your personal data
Privci’s opt-out management feature makes opting out a simple and convenient process. Includes templates and tools that take care of ad networks, direct marketing, and data brokers.

4 - Don't let them follow you. Browse faster
As soon as you leave a website, Privci automatically removes any first-party cookies installed to track or collect your browsing data.

Also provides the option to block the installation of well-known ad tracking cookies or similar technologies.

5 - Know your digital footprint
As a data privacy extension for Chrome, Privci stands out as the most extensive online digital footprint tracker. Through the automated mapping of your data traces, Privci provides you with a complete overview of who has your data, what type of data they may have, including an estimated level of exposure of internet users to your digital identity.


-----------------------

As an online privacy extension, we strive to spot potential traps and help you avoid them. We believe that you should enjoy freedom when you are online without stressing over your personal data and privacy.

Our ultimate goal at Privci is to protect your privacy by minimising your vulnerability to malicious activity, such as privacy invasions and identity theft.

Get Privci today and stay on top of your data privacy by controlling who collects your personal data and what they do with it.

-----------------------
We hope you will enjoy Privci and would like to know your thoughts.

Let us know about any issues or questions you would like our extension to answer by writing to us at support@privci.io.

Note: This extension will send notifications to you using the Google Chrome push notification service. These notifications are necessary to communicate with you key findings after processing a privacy policy, and will only be used for that purpose. You can manage these notifications from the extension's settings, and turn them off or on at your discretion.

Before installing our extension, please make sure you read and agree to our privacy policy at https://secure.privci.com/privacy
